content: Crafting materials are the most important items you can find in Black Myth: Wukong, besides Key Items. These form the core of the entire upgrade and crafting economy in Black Myth: Wukong, from upgrading your equipment, to giving you permanant stat boosts from Xu Dog in Yellow Wind Ridge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crafting_Materials.md', within the main section titled 'Crafting Materials'.
The content is as follows:
Crafting materials are the most important items you can find in Black Myth: Wukong, besides Key Items. These form the core of the entire upgrade and crafting economy in Black Myth: Wukong, from upgrading your equipment, to giving you permanant stat boosts from Xu Dog in Yellow Wind Ridge.
